page.title: 19A Hereford School Pantomime.
page.content: { Our school pantomime was{"Ali Baba {and the 40 Thieves"}(well, only 5 thieves really.) We performed it on the 12th and 13th February,1985. The{first night}went wrong a little. I was the cleaning Genie and I dropped the beads! Everybody laughed. The second night went well, I was feeling ill but I still acted well. We had a{collection}after every performance. The money was for the N.S.P.C.C. which means the National Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Children. We raised just over one hundred pounds. The pantomime was a great success and we all enjoyed ourselves.
